sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.scss'] }) export class SignupComponent implements OnInit { signupForm!: FormGroup name= new FormControl(); email= new FormControl(); password= new FormControl(); constructor(private fb: FormBuilder, private auth: AuthService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.signupForm = this.fb.group({ name: [null, Validators.required], email: [null, Validators.required, Validators.email], password:[null, Validators.required, Validators.maxLength(8)] }) } submit(data: any){ this.auth.userSignUp(data); console.log(data); } }

SignUp Form

Name
Email
Password
